process.title: Method and governance
process.step1: Decision framing: scope, critical assumptions, and regulatory constraints.
process.step2: Mapping: dependencies, no-return points, and fragile scenarios.
process.step3: Production: evidence pack, tactical alerts, and arbitration protocols.
process.step4: Steering: recurring executive review and decision adjustment.

governance.title: Who participates and how
items: Steering committee: industrial leadership, CIO, compliance, procurement, operations.
Cadence: weekly operational check-in plus monthly executive decision review.
Escalation: 48-hour arbitration target on critical signals.

weekly.title: Deliverables and decision criteria
items: Weekly: risk board, new signals, and recommended decisions.
Monthly: updated evidence pack and documentary compliance status.
Go/no-go criteria: margin impact, compliance exposure, execution delay.
